_sText:
##### Please visit my blog to know what I am doing! It's in Polish language! [>>Masogs blog<<](http://masog.wordpress.com "")

This is my new map mg_, and first course map.
You must beat 8 levels. My best record on this map - _2 minutes 41 seconds_. _(New record!! :] 2 minutes 25 seconds)_

I did this map in something like 20 hours of work in Hammer Editor.

This map is in beta2 version, and it's tested on MultiPlayer and SinglePlayer and it works perfectly.

Beta2 changes:

- AFK Killer after 40 seconds.
- 3 Level is easier. After every 10 seconds unbreakable places of floor are green. Breakable pieces of floor are "more" breakable.
- 4 Level is easier. After every 5 seconds you can see white blocks and you know where to jump.
- Removed dead sound.
- Added arrows to the TIPs and MAPs.
- Last jump to the END is easier.

Max players: 46

Requirements: 

- No-Block plugin,

Recommend:

- Race Timer plugin.

Enjoy :)
